code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PetCard=_ref=>{let{pet}=_ref;if(!pet){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pet-card placeholder",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"No pet selected"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Please select a pet to see details."})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pet-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:pet.image,alt:pet.name,className:"pet-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"pet-name",children:pet.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"pet-breed",children:pet.breed}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"adopt-button",onClick:()=>alert("Adopt ".concat(pet.name)),children:"Adopt"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"details-button",onClick:()=>alert("Details about ".concat(pet.name)),children:"Details"})]});};export default PetCard;
